items.sentence: Tom said that you wanted to eat lunch with us.
Tom doesn\'t know that I don\'t often do that.
I couldn\'t think of anything I\'d enjoy more.
I don\'t want you to think I don\'t mean that.
Tom and Mary both left the office early today.
Do you want to join us for a drink afterwards?
Do your homework as soon as you finish dinner.
Tom is standing close to Mary in that picture.
It wouldn\'t be a good idea to lend Tom money.
I had no idea that you were in here in Boston.
